item.title: Website Building Cheatsheet
item.description: A cheatsheet on all things that are good-to-know when making a website. Intended for beginners, but helpful as a reference for everyone! Table of Contents Menu • Forcefully refreshing your CSS • Simple Font Sizes • Margins, Paddings and Borders • Stackoverflow and MDN Web Docs Forcefully refreshing your CSSOften when working with CSS, your changes wont appear when you refresh the page. This is due to the previous version being kept by the browser in the cache (this is usually a good thing since you wont need to re-download the CSS file every time you visit the site.
